item.title: [PI] help with parsing error [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

This will work, you just messed with your brackets

public void DonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) {
                                if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("partyhatset")) {
                                int itemsToAdd[] = { 1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048 };
                                for(int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) {
                                c.getItems().addItem(itemsToAdd[i], 1);
                        }
                        }
                                if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("santahat")) {
                                            c.getItems().addItem(1050, 1);
                                   }
                                if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("halloween")) {
                                int itemsToAdd[] = { 1053, 1055, 1057 };
                                for(int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) {
                                c.getItems().addItem(itemsToAdd[i], 1);
                        }
                        }
                                if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("godswords")) {
                                int itemsToAdd[] = { 11694, 11696, 11698, 11700 };
                                for(int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) {
                                c.getItems().addItem(itemsToAdd[i], 1);
                        }
                        }    
}

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] help with parsing error [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

public void DonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) { if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("partyhatset")) { int itemsToAdd[] = { 1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048 }; for(int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) { c.getItems().addItem(itemsToAdd[i], 1); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("santahat")) { c.getItems().addItem(1050, 1); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("halloween")) { int itemsToAdd[] = { 1053, 1055, 1057 }; for(int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) { c.getItems().addItem(itemsToAdd[i], 1); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("godswords")) { int itemsToAdd[] = { 11694, 11696, 11698, 11700 }; for(int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) { c.getItems().addItem(itemsToAdd[i], 1); } }

or

public void DonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) { if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("partyhatset")) { int itemsToAdd[] = { 1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048 }; for(int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) { c.getItems().addItem(itemsToAdd[i], 1); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("santahat")) { c.getItems().addItem(1050, 1); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("halloween")) { int itemsToAdd[] = { 1053, 1055, 1057 }; for(int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) { c.getItems().addItem(itemsToAdd[i], 1); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("godswords")) { int itemsToAdd[] = { 11694, 11696, 11698, 11700 }; for(int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) { c.getItems().addItem(itemsToAdd[i], 1); } } }

item.title: [PI] help with parsing error [PI]
item.dc:creator: @billcosby41 billcosby41
item.description:
@billcosby41 wrote:

I tried to add these commands

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("partyhatset")) { int itemsToAdd[] = { 1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048 }; for(int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) { c.getItems().addItem(itemsToAdd[i], 1); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("santahat")) { c.getItems().addItem(1050, 1); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("halloween")) { int itemsToAdd[] = { 1053, 1055, 1057 }; for(int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) { c.getItems().addItem(itemsToAdd[i], 1); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("godswords")) { int itemsToAdd[] = { 11694, 11696, 11698, 11700 }; for(int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) { c.getItems().addItem(itemsToAdd[i], 1); }
But now I get this compiler error

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1696: reached end of file while p arsing {→ ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
Here is my commands.java part

public void DonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) { if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("partyhatset")) { int itemsToAdd[] = { 1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048 }; for(int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) { c.getItems().addItem(itemsToAdd[i], 1); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("santahat")) { c.getItems().addItem(1050, 1); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("halloween")) { int itemsToAdd[] = { 1053, 1055, 1057 }; for(int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) { c.getItems().addItem(itemsToAdd[i], 1); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("godswords")) { int itemsToAdd[] = { 11694, 11696, 11698, 11700 }; for(int i = 0; i < itemsToAdd.length; i++) { c.getItems().addItem(itemsToAdd[i], 1); } {
So can anybody help me please? I have searched, but I don’t understand! Thanks for help!

Read full topic
